title: Top Boy with Spinall
description: There’s always a next level. This week, the boys are kicking it with DJ, producer and record executive Spinall. Spinall was nice enough to host us in his hotel room to explain how to complain to the manager like a celebrity, being a literal man of many hats, why Nigerian style is so underrated, the most stylish cities across the globe, what we’re getting up to on a night out on the town in Lagos, secret strip clubs, his boys Wizkid and Burna Boy, how to spit game to Nigerian women, his mindset before hitting the biggest stages in the world, his tour rider, how to avoid killing the vibe when you get on the aux, a look inside his collaborative process, career highlights, the most embarrassing tunes in his Spotify played recently, Grammy fits, how much he’s spent on jewelry in his lifetime, taking over new industries, how Instagram doesn’t accurately reflect his hometown fame, the way to a superstar’s heart, R&B sex playlists and much more on this worldly and wonderful episode of The Only Podcast That Matters™.
dc:creator: Throwing Fits
